jdbcService.sql: select id, created, modified, started, stopped, owner_id, verified, enabled, parent_id, version, priority, name, title, description, path, slug, language_id, component_id from nodes where component_id = :componentId and parent_id = :parentId and (:enabled is null or enabled = :enabled) and (:query is null or name ilike '%' || :query || '%' or title ilike '%' || :query || '%' or description ilike '%' || :query || '%') order by created, name, path desc
